Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Mochi}} [[File:Mochi 002.jpg|thumb|'''{{m|ja||餅|tr=mochi}}''': a pair of '''[[glutinous rice]] [[rice cake|cake]]s''']]
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|もち}} {{IPAchar|/mot͡ɕiː/}} → {{IPAchar|/mot͡ɕi/}} Shift from older ''mochii'', historical ''mochihi'' (see below).{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}{{R:Daijisen}} Now the modern term for a ''[[glutinous rice]] [[rice cake|cake]]''. Compare {{m|ja|モモンガ|tr=momonga||{{w|Japanese dwarf flying squirrel}}}}, with a similar shift.
